ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Sorry for the foul comment
ygData.msgSnippet: ... To me it seems like they accidentally ran into a very sensitive area. From my perspective, which I hope is an impartial point of view, I do not believe
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:28 AM 9/1/00 -0400, Lyrnia Jongleur wrote:

>This list just seems to get nastier every time I read it. I remember when
>it was pretty friendly and we all shared info.
>
>I have better things to do with my time than read flames on my sig line (of

To me it seems like they accidentally ran into a very sensitive area. From
my perspective, which I hope is an impartial point of view, I do not
believe there was malice intended. I think they just meant to poke at the
tag line jokingly.

I offer my sincere condolences to you, Lyrnia, for the very tragic loss of
your friend.

Sincerely,
Windleaf Mistsong
